popover.primary: A mastery path focused on damage from afar
A mastery path focused on faster casting shorter range damage
A mastery path focused on daemons and close combat

data.name: Aegis of Orange Fire
data.description: You summon and absorb orange flames to increase your Wounds by 150, increasing your total life for 20 seconds. During this time, any enemies striking you has a 25% chance to receive 232 Elemental damage from your flames.
data.rawDescription: You summon and absorb orange flames to increase your Wounds by {COM_0_VAL0}, increasing your total life for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. During this time, any enemies striking you has a 25% chance to receive {COM_3_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} from your flames.

data.name: Agonizing Torrent
data.description: Your disk emanates an aura of pain that inflicts 188 Spirit damage every 3 seconds for 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your disk emanates an aura of pain that inflicts {COM_1_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} every {COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.
data.rawDescription: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for {ABIL_3595_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Elemental damage over {ABIL_3595_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Baleful Transmogrification
data.description: Bends and twists your target from within to deal 835 Elemental damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Bends and twists your target from within to deal {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Bolt of Change
data.description: An undefendable bolt of far-traveling force that inflicts 633 Elemental damage.
data.rawDescription: An undefendable bolt of far-traveling force that inflicts {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Changer's Blessing
data.description: Surging Violet Fire will now heal you for 50% of damage dealt.
data.rawDescription: Surging Violet Fire will now heal you for 50% of damage dealt.

data.name: Chaos Unleashed
data.description: Increases the critical hit rate of all Path of Havoc spells by 15%.
data.rawDescription: Increases the critical hit rate of all Path of Havoc spells by 15%.

data.name: Chaotic Attunement
data.description: Daemons can now be summoned instantly and the cost of Resummon is reduced to 0 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Daemons can now be summoned instantly and the cost of Resummon is reduced to 0 Action Points.

data.name: Chaotic Rift
data.description: A rift in the warp is opened briefly, pulling up to six enemy players within 75 feet of the vortex towards its center and then snaring everyone within 30 feet a second later by 40% for 4 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the initial pull.
data.rawDescription: A rift in the warp is opened briefly, pulling up to six enemy players within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the vortex towards its center and then snaring everyone within {COM_4_RADI_FEET} a second later by {COM_4_VAL0}% for {COM_4_DURA_SECONDS}. Monsters will be knocked down by the initial pull.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Your cast times are reduced to {COM_0_VAL0}% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Conduit of Chaos
data.description: Focusing the great powers of Chaos for 10 seconds, you may tirelessly use all your abilities for no AP cost.
data.rawDescription: Focusing the great powers of Chaos for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, you may tirelessly use all your abilities for no AP cost.

data.name: Daemonic Armor
data.description: You surround yourself with daemonic protection, increasing your Armor by 560 for up to 1 hours.
data.rawDescription: You surround yourself with daemonic protection, increasing your Armor by {COM_0_VAL0} for up to {COM_0_DURA_HOURS}.

data.name: Daemonic Contract
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.
data.rawDescription: Your damage is increased by {COM_1_VAL0}% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Daemonic Infestation
data.description: You call fourth a small daemon which will persist in an area for 1 minute. The daemon will explode when an enemy gets too close, dealing 243 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggering them for 5 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.
data.rawDescription: You call fourth a small daemon which will persist in an area for 1 minute. The daemon will explode when an enemy gets too close, dealing {ABIL_383_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} and staggering them for {ABIL_3167_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Daemonic Lash
data.description: An ethereal tentacle swipes the target in front of you for 203 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: An ethereal tentacle swipes the target in front of you for {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Daemonic Maw
data.description: Deals 328 Spirit damage and reduces movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} and reduces movement speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Daemonic Pact
data.description: Forms a pact with newly summoned daemons that increases both you and your daemon's Toughness by 100 while it remains in this realm.
data.rawDescription: Forms a pact with newly summoned daemons that increases both you and your daemon's Toughness by {COM_0_VAL0} while it remains in this realm.

data.name: Daemonic Reach
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of Changing abilities by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Increases the ranges of all Path of Changing abilities by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Daemonic Resistance
data.description: Increases your group members' Corporeal resistance by 157 if they are within 100 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: Increases your group members' Corporeal resistance by {COM_0_VAL0} if they are within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Daemonic Scream
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all targets in a line in front of you up to 65 feet away.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all targets in a line in front of you up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: Daemonic Withering
data.description: Withered Soul will now also cause the victim to suffer 15% more damage from all sources.
data.rawDescription: Withered Soul will now also cause the victim to suffer {ABIL_8491_COM_2_VAL0}% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 Action Points. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}. This effect cannot occur more than once every {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Dissolving Mist
data.description:
Summons a cloud of caustic mist that deals 79 Spirit damage every 2 seconds to targets within 20 feet of the summoning point. After 10 seconds the cloud doubles in strength, dealing 146 Spirit damage and 10 seconds later will double in strength again, dealing 212 Spirit damage.
If there are multiple Dissolving Mist in the same area only the highest level mist will deal damage.
data.rawDescription:
Summons a cloud of caustic mist that deals {COM_3_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} every 2 seconds to targets within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the summoning point. After {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} the cloud doubles in strength, dealing {COM_5_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} and {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} later will double in strength again, dealing {COM_7_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.
If there are multiple Dissolving Mist in the same area only the highest level mist will deal damage.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Increases your Intelligence by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Intelligence by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Endless Pandemonium
data.description: Pandemonium will now reapply its damage effect 50% of the time after it ends or is removed.
data.rawDescription: Pandemonium will now reapply its damage effect 50% of the time after it ends or is removed.

data.name: Fiery Winds
data.description: Flickering Red Fire and Surging Violet Fire will hit one additional enemy up to 15 feet away from the target.
data.rawDescription: Flickering Red Fire and Surging Violet Fire will hit one additional enemy up to {ABIL_8470_COM_1_RADI_FEET} away from the target.

data.name: Firewyrm of Tzeentch
data.description: Summons a mighty Firewyrm that will rampage around attacking your enemies for 16 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Summons a mighty Firewyrm that will rampage around attacking your enemies for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Flame's Kiss
data.description: Rend Winds and Flickering Red Fire are now undefendable.
data.rawDescription: Rend Winds and Flickering Red Fire are now undefendable.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flickering Red Fire
data.description: Summons a chaotic bundle of red flame that flies toward your opponent to inflict 320 Elemental damage.
data.rawDescription: Summons a chaotic bundle of red flame that flies toward your opponent to inflict {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Glean Magic
data.description: You strip away the Spiritual protections of everyone 20 feet from your target, reducing their Spirit resistance by 236 and dealing 420 Spirit damage over 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You strip away the Spiritual protections of everyone {COM_0_RADI_FEET} from your target, reducing their Spirit resistance by {COM_1_VAL0} and dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_SPIRITDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and Snares by 60% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}

data.name: Horrifying Visions
data.description: Horrifying images distract your opponent, causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds.  You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.
data.rawDescription: Horrifying images distract your opponent, causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

data.name: Indigo Fire of Change
data.description: A horrible torrent of energy that deals 387 Elemental damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. Victims killed while bathed in this flame will return 120 Action Points over 6 seconds to you.

data.rawDescription: Daemons will be summoned with {COM_0_VAL0} more Wounds.

data.rawDescription: You force so much power into your daemon that it explodes from within, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to all targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, knocking them down for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.
data.rawDescription: A focused blast that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming Magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.
data.rawDescription: You gain a strong counter aura for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will reduce half of any incoming Magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.rawDescription: You open a rift surrounding your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} and weakening the fabric of reality around them, disarming them for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.rawDescription: Tears at your foe with fierce winds, hitting them three times for a total of {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Resummon
data.description: You shift your active summoning circle to your current location, bringing your minion with it.
data.rawDescription: You shift your active summoning circle to your current location, bringing your minion with it.

data.name: Roiling Winds

data.rawDescription: Winds tear out from your target, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to them and everyone within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} every second for 4 seconds.

data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target and staggers them for {ABIL_3168_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Seed of Chaos
data.description: Grows a seed inside your target dealing 435 Spirit damage over 15 seconds. After this time expires or the target is killed, the seed will explode using the victims life force to deal 183 Spirit damage to all targets within 20 feet.

data.description: Stabilizes your daemonic minion, restoring 689 health every second for 3 seconds and making it briefly immune to damage.
data.rawDescription: Stabilizes your daemonic minion, restoring {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} every second for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and making it briefly immune to damage.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving them to you. Your target's Intelligence will also be reduced by 160 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You drain power from your target, stealing up to 200 action points from your target and giving them to you. Your target's Intelligence will also be reduced by {COM_2_VAL0} for 30 seconds.

data.name: Sleight of Hand
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 50% less than normal.
data.rawDescription: Enemy monsters will hate you {COM_0_VAL1}% less than normal.

data.name: Soul Leak
data.description: Deals 1596 damage over 10 seconds and removes 50 Action Points every 2 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and removes {COM_1_VAL0} Action Points every {COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}.

data.name: Summon Blue Horror
data.description: Summons a daemonic minion with short range area of effect attacks. The minion gains 50% of Int and 100% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within 25 feet of the minion you will be empowered by unholy energy every 2 seconds, increasing your damage by 4% to a maximum of 20%, your Dodge and Disrupt by 4% to a maximum of 32%, the radius of your AoE abilities by 6.25% to a maximum of 50%, but reduce your cast range by 5% to a minimum of 60%. You lose 4 stacks of this effect if the daemon is slain.
data.rawDescription: Summons a daemonic minion with short range area of effect attacks. The minion gains 50% of Int and 100% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within {ABIL_1071_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the minion you will be empowered by unholy energy every {ABIL_1071_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, increasing your damage by {ABIL_1072_COM_0_VAL0}% to a maximum of {ABIL_1072_COM_0_VAL1}%, your Dodge and Disrupt by 4% to a maximum of 32%, the radius of your AoE abilities by 6.25% to a maximum of 50%, but reduce your cast range by 5% to a minimum of 60%. You lose 4 stacks of this effect if the daemon is slain.

data.name: Summon Flamer
data.description: Summons a daemonic minion with moderate range Spiritual attacks. The minion gains 75% of Int and 75% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within 25 feet of the minion you will be empowered by unholy energy every 2 seconds, increasing your damage by 4% to a maximum of 20%, shortening the duration and tick interval of Path of Changing and Path of Daemonology DoTs by 4% to a maximum of 35% and allow Changing skills to be cast while moving. You lose 4 stacks of this effect if the daemon is slain.
data.rawDescription: Summons a daemonic minion with moderate range Spiritual attacks. The minion gains 75% of Int and 75% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within {ABIL_1071_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the minion you will be empowered by unholy energy every {ABIL_1071_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, increasing your damage by {ABIL_1072_COM_0_VAL0}% to a maximum of {ABIL_1072_COM_0_VAL1}%, shortening the duration and tick interval of Path of Changing and Path of Daemonology DoTs by 4% to a maximum of 35% and allow Changing skills to be cast while moving. You lose 4 stacks of this effect if the daemon is slain.

data.name: Summon Pink Horror
data.description: Summons a daemonic minion with long range Elemental attacks.The daemonic minion gains 100% of Int and 50% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within 25 feet of the minion you will be empowered by unholy energy every 2 seconds, increasing your damage by 4% to a maximum of 20% and range by 5% to a maximum of 25% extra range. You will lose 4 stacks of this effect if daemon is slain.
data.rawDescription: Summons a daemonic minion with long range Elemental attacks.The daemonic minion gains 100% of Int and 50% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within {ABIL_1071_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of the minion you will be empowered by unholy energy every {ABIL_1071_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, increasing your damage by {ABIL_1072_COM_0_VAL0}% to a maximum of {ABIL_1072_COM_0_VAL1}% and range by 5% to a maximum of 25% extra range. You will lose 4 stacks of this effect if daemon is slain.

data.name: Surge of Insanity
data.description: A surge of chaotic bliss overcomes your target, dealing 291 Spirit damage.  The victim and any other enemies within 20 feet of them are also interruped, cancelling any abilities that they are building up.
data.rawDescription: A surge of chaotic bliss overcomes your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.  The victim and any other enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them are also interruped, cancelling any abilities that they are building up.

data.name: Surging Power
data.description: Increases critical damage from Infernal Blast, Surging Violet Fire, Flickering Red Fire, and Surge of Insanity by 50%.
data.rawDescription: Increases critical damage from Infernal Blast, Surging Violet Fire, Flickering Red Fire, and Surge of Insanity by 50%.

data.name: Surging Violet Fire
data.description: Tendrils of writhing violet flame coil around your target, burning them for 241 Elemental damage.
data.rawDescription: Tendrils of writhing violet flame coil around your target, burning them for {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE}.

data.name: Swift Flames
data.description: Reduces Surging Violet Fire's cooldown by 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Reduces Surging Violet Fire's cooldown by 7 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Firestorm
data.description: Creates a great column of wind and flame that deals 265 Spirit damage every 2 seconds to all targets within 20 feet of the area, and snares them by 20%. This spell requires a high amount of concentration and you will be set back by .5 seconds whenever hit.
data.rawDescription: Creates a great column of wind and flame that deals {COM_2_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} every 2 seconds to all targets within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of the area, and snares them by 20%. This spell requires a high amount of concentration and you will be set back by .5 seconds whenever hit.

data.name: Tzeentch's Grasp
data.description: A summoning wave passes over those within 30 feet of you, calling fourth tentacles to bind their movement for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.
data.rawDescription: A summoning wave passes over those within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you, calling fourth tentacles to bind their movement for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Elemental resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Unearthly Shriek
data.description: Pink Horrors, Blue Horrors and Flamers of Tzeentch now have a 15% chance to taunt their targets with every attack. This enrages the target, interrupting any building actions and forces monsters to target your pet for 5 seconds. Taunted targets receive  20% more damage from your daemon. If your daemon is struck 3 times by their taunted target, taunt will be broken.
data.rawDescription: Pink Horrors, Blue Horrors and Flamers of Tzeentch now have a 15% chance to taunt their targets with every attack. This enrages the target, interrupting any building actions and forces monsters to target your pet for {ABIL_3980_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. Taunted targets receive  {ABIL_3947_COM_2_VAL0}% more damage from your daemon. If your daemon is struck 3 times by their taunted target, taunt will be broken.

Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.

data.rawDescription: Increases the critical hit rate of all Path of Changing spells by 15%.
